title: Effective Educational Video Design Strategies: Science Content Production for Pre-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Basic knowledge of educational technology and experience in video production
context.additional_context: A course for pre-/in-service teachers to strengthen science education video design competencies, optimized for low-cost smartphone-based production environments.

learning_goals: Three or more integration strategies for visual elements (graphics/animation) and audio explanations can be explained when producing educational videos
Videos can be designed applying screen composition principles (size, placement, timing) to enhance learning concentration
In a restricted technological environment, one can produce a video under 5 minutes that conveys scientific concepts using only a smartphone
One can analyze and apply elements (facial expressions, gestures) to enhance social presence

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
